entry.title: Why leave?
entry.content:
Leave previous firm is very common for us. But it’s definitely important to tell the reason of your leaving in a smart way.

When we encounter this situation, we maybe say previous company didn’t offer much
challenge or not much prospects for the future. Of course, many of us want to earn more money by changing a new job or new position. In general speaking, previous company help us build skills and we have got used the job. We need to more salary because we’re more valuable in job market.To be honest,
sometime it didn’t like this. Indeed, some of people did’t like their job and they always change jobs without skilling improved.
Maybe some guys will say previous job is not suitable for their career in long-term. This is why they can’t stay for a long time.
In short, interviewer want to know as more as they can to make sure that you are suitable for the job position. And we should finish your work perfectly to improve our skills.
entry.summary: Leave previous firm is very common for us. But i

entry.title: Change
entry.content:
No change, No chance! It’s very hard to say good bye to the old styles, but If it do really help users to make a better life, better work. Why we don’t to have a try. Each change is impossible to let every users like it, even love it. But we still believe that we should make our best effort to let old guys to get used it in seconds.
Maybe it need a little bit time to suit the new circumstance, we must try our best to make it easier and more intuitive to use.

Simple & Intuitive & Powerful!

entry.title: bless
entry.content: Foreigner will always say “Bless you” after someone sneeze or cough. It’s mean that god bless you. Why do they say it? It’s started from hundreds of years ago. There was a plague in Europe which caused million of people to dead. It’s also called The Black Death. If people got a plague, they will often sneeze or cough. And it’s extremely terrible disease when people infected by this plague. So people always said “God bless you” to pray and wished god can protect them from death.
entry.summary: Foreigner will always say “Bless yo

entry.title: Maching Learning
entry.content:
Have you heard machine learning? It’s very popular now. Many people talk about it. It’s a very big changce to make a lots of money. But what’s that means? Is there an easy way to understand it?

When we google it, we can find tons of stuff about AI(Artificial Intelligence) and machine learning is just a branch of it. In short, As a computer fan says: machine learning is the idea that there are generic algorithms that can tell you something interesting about a set of data without you having to write any custom code specific to the problem. Instead of writing code, you feed data to the generic algorithm and it builds its own logic based on the data.
entry.summary: Have you heard machine lear

entry.title: Interview
entry.content:
We’re happy and extremely excited when we receive a interview notice. But also many guys have a little bit nervous when they have a talk with the interviewer face to face. It’s very common for every one. Because when we in a new circumstance, everything looks strange and feel a little or a lot uneasy. For the old driver it’s nothing. They are not afraid of it. They have a lots of experiences at interviewing. It’s a piece of cake for them. But for the new guys who is just graduated from college is a little bit hard.

But if we prepare enough, it will’t be a problem. First, we should know the jobs’s detail and what’s the most important skills it needed. Second, understand what’s the interviewer want to know from you. Third, take a test yourself to demo interview flow. You can let your friend act as the interviewer to preview it. So it can help you familiar with interview flow to establish confidence. Also we should prepare some words to talk about your background,education and work experiences. Every interviewer will start the interview from these very basic information about you.
entry.summary: We’re happy and extremely

entry.title: Neighbor
entry.content:
Neighbor is very import for us in china. When we’re children we live around at country. We have many little friends and play together, we know each other like brother or sister. But nowadays. It seems to be a great different. Everything is changing so fast and neighbors are changed with the same speed. Many of
us move to city and live in city. If we don’t have a house we have to rent one. And we alway need to change it caused by new jobs, landlord, new friends, estate agent. So our neighbors will be often new to each of us. Don’t like old time, we have some very steady neighbors because they don’t need to change it’s home again and again in a very quick frequency. Because we have own house even through them looks very common - No air conditioner, No fridge, No tap water, No closestool.

We can’t go back. Of course we can’t change the trend of society but to integrate into society.
entry.summary: Neighbor is very import for us i

entry.title: Personality
entry.content:
When we talk about with friends, we often need to describe your or other people’s personalities. So what different types are there to describe your personalities? In short, we can divide them into there main types (positive , negative,normal).

For positive, like easy-going, outgoing,outspoken, open-minded, diligent, well-balanced,extroverted,magnanimous etc.
For negative, like superstition, clumsy, reckless,naive,etc.
For normal, like adventurous, ambitious,eloquent,naive,etc.

Does everyone want to become easy-going, outgoing? I don’t know. But I don’t think everybody like to be same. Someone are easy-going with ambitious, and someone are open-minded person with naive. Each of us have different types personalities. We are from different countries, different place, have different life experiences, and we also are changing day by day. So don’t worry about your current personalities weather there’re positive or negative, just keep to do best yourself. And finally you will find everything around yourself are turned to better.

As Steve jobs says: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
entry.summary: When we talk about with friends, we often nee

entry.title: Party
entry.content:
It’s necessary to write a summary of daily english learning. Today I have listened a lesson about attending friends party. Although it’s not normal to attend friend’s party in China and we always join in
friend’s birthday party, wedding.

From the lesson, I have a very useful sentence: Made it. It’s mean arriving at the place. So when you invite your friends to your party and they just arrives and you can say: you guys made it.

Also we may have a small chat to exchange greetings. Just like : Thank you for having us or Thank you for inviting us. And if you bring some gifts to your friends. You can say: Here’s a little something for you.
To reply this, we could say: You shouldn’t have.

When we come into friends house, we often need to take off our shoes. And you could ask your friends: Should I need to take off shoes? At some times, your friend don’t mind this at all. Leave your shoes on will be ok.

If you want to express your opinion or thinking about your friends house decoration. We always say I love what you have done in the place. But if it’s not done by yourself, you maybe say I can’t take credit for it though. It was all my wife , husband , girl friend or boy friend.

We will often meet this situation your friends highly recommend you to eat some special desserts or foods, you could say: How could I or we resist?
entry.summary: It’s necessary to write a summary of daily english

entry.title: advance
entry.content: No choice, but advance.

entry.title: Artisan
entry.content:
Recently I have listened many times about artisan. From 2008, the mobile internet has grew up about 8 years.And this industry now is in a steady growing period. It’s market has changed a lot and it didn’t like 5 years ago anymore. It’s hard to make your product to get a good revenue right now. Even through you have a product which looks like great. Because many requests of users are full filled enough today.
It become harder to make an AHA product nowdays. And all of huge companies have inveseted lots of money, peoples and other resoures on these products. So for the main sections of mobile products indeed mastered and controlled by these very huge “Monsters”. It looks like small companies have no chance or power to fight with them.

Does it mean we need to discard our efforts, to say we’re failed? No! I believe that every one has their limited , also every company has it’s limited too. As far as we know, many of big companies can’t win at next technology revolution. But only a few companies and people will catch next technology revolustion chance. So what we can do right now? Which is the right things we should follow? What’s the future? In fact, I dont know.But I’m sure artisan will be more and more valuable. So what we need to do just base on very simple rules:

  1. Turn ourself to artisans
  2. Invest in new technologies
  3. Keep running fast
entry.summary: Recently I have listened many times about artisan. From 2008,

entry.title: It's amazing!
entry.content:
I have learned a lot from professor LiShanYou who has created HunDun University recently. I have watched the video about the revolution of cognition online from their office app - HunDun App which has released professor Li’s new course: The Revolution of cognition.

I’m very exicted about this course. It do really open a door for me to re-view the world. How it works? What’s the most basic rules of world running on it?

Professor Li has explained the most important key point is The first principle and everything in the world are ruled by very simple rules only about 2 or 3 rules from different domain including philosophy, physics, biology, cosmolgy.

It’s amzing. The complicated world is just ruled by very simle rules. It’s sound very crazy and unbelievable. The wonderful part from biology. Biology system is advanced by following very simple
principles (from Darwin): the first one is: Genetic Variation , the second one is: competition for existence. He has gave some simulated games and examples. They’re very interesting & amazing & incredible. For exmple: Game of life, colony of ants, colony of sardines.

Thank professor Li to open a compeletely new door to me to re-view, re-think of the world! It’s amzing and mean a lot for me!
entry.summary: I have learned a lot from

entry.title: a small accident
entry.content:
There was a traffic accident this morning. Fortunately it’s a small accident. A boy has scraped by

a tricycle electric car. The boy and his father got down from a overbrige and were passing a bicycle

lane. A middle-aged man drived a tricycle car very fast and just knocked the boy’s arm. The boy and his schoolbag were fall down on the road soon!

The little boy’s father was very angy and rage. He instantly pulled down the driver from tricycle car after it stopped. And slapped him hard across the face. The driver looked like very self-abuse and didn’t hit back.

When I got closed to see what happened to the boy, and found the boy’s arm got hurt. There are two red blocks on his left arm with a little blood. His mind looked normal and shouted “It’s too pain!”.

I did know what happened next… But fortunately it’s a small accident. In short, all of us need to take care when we pass through road and it’s every one’s duty to comply with the rules when your are a rider or driver.
entry.summary: There was a traffic accident this morn

entry.title: Writing every day from today
entry.content:
From the view of article of HeCaiTou which a famous people on Dedao App. I did’t subscribe his channel.

But I’m a fan of LuoZhengYu which I think his as my teacher and friend who will post sixty seconds audio records about their ideas, knowledge, experience and wisdom to their followers every day moring. And i have read his audio about writing this morning. HeCaiTou says that wring let you move you focus from lots of useless think to the real things. And it’s the most simple and easy way to experience the whole progress of the matter.

Today we’re all want to make money faster and faster, success faster and faster. Most of us want to become a million moneybags at one night. and our heart is swamped with lots of noise, informations.

And we should know think is always think forever if we don’t take action to do something. we need to pick up our pen , our keyboard to writing , to typing what you think. which let you high speed rolling
head down and let you finger to listen your ideas, your thoughts. It’s simple and easy, but it works.

I have learned english from Junior to today, but it still looks like i have’t got a big improved. Maybe the method is wrong. But after I have read HeCaiTou’s article and recent learning from LiXiaoLai, Maybe I have found the solution and do really understand the persistence is very important and practice it again and again is the best way to master a language , a skill, a way to think.

Let me rock with english from now! Just do it and keep at it forever!
entry.summary: From the view of article o

entry.title: 洛可可关于产品设计的分享
怎么写出100万级别阅读量的文案？
entry.content:
不要羡慕别人写的好文案，能有几百万的阅读量，因为人家有门道，下了大功夫，找对方法！

  • 用户关注自己相关的，反差大的信息
  • 如何把产品跟用户关注的东西绑定

90%营销人写文案前的第一个错误 - 李叫兽的好文
entry.summary: 不要羡慕别人写的好文案，能有几百万的阅读量，因为人家有门道，下了大功夫，找对方法！
